title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid input data including username, email, and password.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input valid username, valid email, and strong password
Submit the registration form
Verify registration success message and automatic login or redirect to login page

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Check that registration fails with an invalid email format and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input valid username, invalid email format, and strong password
Submit the registration form
Verify error message indicating invalid email address

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a registered user can successfully login with correct email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter registered email and correct password
Click login button
Verify user is logged in and redirected to HomeScreen

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Ensure that login fails when a registered email is used with incorrect password, showing correct error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter registered email and incorrect password
Click login button
Verify error message about incorrect credentials

title: Password Recovery with Registered Email
description: Verify password recovery process initiates successfully for a registered email address.

steps.description: Navigate to password recovery screen
Input registered email address
Submit password recovery request
Confirm that password recovery email or instructions are sent/indicated

title: Profile Update: Avatar Upload and Stats Display
description: Ensure user can upload avatar image, and profile displays level, BPoints, BCoins, and statistics correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile screen
Upload a valid avatar image
Verify avatar updates and persists
Check display correctness of user level, BPoints, BCoins, and statistics

title: Game Room Creation with Custom Settings
description: Test host can create a bingo game room configuring prize type and draw intervals successfully.

steps.description: Login as host and go to HostDashboard
Open room creation form
Configure prize type, draw intervals, and required settings
Submit to create room
Verify room is created and appears in host's active rooms list

title: Player Join Room Using Valid Room Code
description: Verify a player can join a game room successfully using a valid room code and receives real-time game state synchronization.

steps.description: Login as player
Navigate to HomeScreen and enter valid room code
Verify player is admitted to ParticipantLobby
Verify real-time game state and player status synchronization begins

title: Player Join Room with Invalid Room Code
description: Check proper error handling when a player tries to join with an invalid or non-existent room code.

steps.description: Login as player
Navigate to HomeScreen and input invalid room code
Attempt to join room
Verify error message indicating invalid or unavailable room code

title: Dynamic Bingo Card Generation and Marking
description: Verify that bingo cards are dynamically generated for each player and marking numbers manually or assisted works correctly.

steps.description: Enter game screen in an active game
Verify generated bingo card is valid and unique per player
Manually mark a number on the bingo card
Verify the mark is registered visually and logically
Use assisted marking feature for a called number
Verify the number is marked automatically

title: Host Controls Real-Time Draw Management
description: Test that the host can control draw pace with Play/Pause and that all players receive synchronized draw updates with celebration animations and sound.

steps.description: Login as host and start a game
Trigger draw to call next bingo number
Verify number is broadcasted and updated in real-time to all players
Verify celebration animations and sound effects upon winner declaration
Pause the draw
Verify draw pauses and no new numbers are called until resumed

title: Global and Room-Specific Chat Functionality
description: Ensure in-game chat supports message sending and receiving globally and within specific rooms including quick messages and emoji support.

steps.description: Join a game room as a player
Send a text message in room-specific chat
Verify message appears for all room participants immediately
Send a quick message and emoji
Verify quick message and emoji are displayed correctly
Navigate to global chat
Send a message in global chat
Verify global chat message is visible to all users

title: Friend Request and Invitation System
description: Verify that users can send friend requests, receive notifications, and send invitations to join rooms using friends list with changes reflected in real-time.

steps.description: Login and navigate to friends system
Send a friend request to another user
Verify friend request notification is received by the other user
Accept friend request and verify friend added to list
Send a game room invitation to a friend
Verify friend receives invitation notification and can join room via it

title: In-Game Store Purchase with Sufficient BCoins
description: Ensure purchases in the store correctly deduct BCoins, grant cosmetic items/boosters, and log transactions appropriately.

steps.description: Navigate to the in-game store
Select an item costing less than current BCoins balance
Complete purchase
Verify BCoins balance is reduced accordingly
Confirm item granted and added to user's inventory
Verify transaction is logged in system

title: In-Game Store Purchase with Insufficient BCoins
description: Check the store prevents purchases when user has insufficient BCoins and displays proper error message.

steps.description: Navigate to in-game store
Select item costing more than current BCoins
Attempt to complete purchase
Verify purchase is blocked and error message about insufficient funds is shown

title: Interface Customization Options Persistence
description: Validate that changing themes, fonts, and colors in settings updates the UI properly and persists on reload or new sessions.

steps.description: Go to interface customization settings
Change theme, font, and color settings
Verify the UI updates accordingly immediately
Reload the app or logout and log back in
Confirm previous interface customizations persist and are applied

title: Auto-Logout After Inactivity Timeout
description: Verify that users are automatically logged out after the defined period of inactivity to preserve resources.

steps.description: Login and remain inactive for inactivity timeout period
Verify user is automatically logged out and redirected to login screen
Attempt to perform user actions after logout without re-authenticating
Verify actions are blocked and login screen is shown

title: Security: Supabase RLS Policy Enforcement
description: Ensure that Row Level Security policies restrict data access so that users can only access authorized data such as their own profile, game rooms they belong to, and permissions.

steps.description: Login as user A
Attempt to access user B's profile data via API or UI
Verify access is denied or data is not retrievable
Attempt to join or view game rooms without membership
Verify access to restricted game state is prevented

title: Real-Time Game State Synchronization Latency
description: Verify that real-time synchronization for game draws, player status, and room states occurs within an acceptable latency threshold with no visible lag.

steps.description: Host initiates a number draw
Validate that all connected players receive the update within defined latency limits (e.g., under 1 second)
Simultaneously simulate multiple player status updates
Confirm all updates propagate correctly and timely across all clients

title: Admin Panel Economic Subscription Controls Verification
description: Ensure the administrative master hub panel allows authorized admins to modify virtual economy parameters and subscription controls with changes correctly reflected in user experience.

steps.description: Login as admin user with required privileges
Navigate to economic and subscription controls panel
Modify virtual currency earning rates and subscription settings
Verify changes are saved and propagated correctly
Logout and login as normal user
Verify updated economic/subscription parameters affect user gameplay and account correctly

title: Splash Screen Load and Transition to Login
description: Verify that the SplashScreen loads correctly on app start and transitions automatically to Login/Register screen within acceptable time.

steps.description: Launch the app
Verify SplashScreen is displayed
Verify automatic transition to Login/Register screen occurs after splash duration
Confirm no freezing or long delays during transition

title: Victory Screen Display with Celebrations and Rewards
description: Ensure that upon winning, the player sees the Victory screen with correct celebration animations, sound effects, and rewards update.

steps.description: Complete a game as a winning player
Verify Victory screen appears with celebration animations and sound
Verify correct rewards (BPoints, items) are credited to player account

title: Handling Network Failures During Game Sync
description: Simulate network interruptions and verify the app handles temporary disconnections gracefully, with attempts to resync and user notification.

steps.description: Start an active bingo game session
Simulate network failure/disconnection for a player
Verify user is notified of connection loss
Restore network connection
Verify automatic resynchronization of game state and player status

title: Rapid Multiple Player Join and Leave Events
description: Test the app stability and state consistency when multiple players rapidly join and leave a game room.

steps.description: Create a host-controlled room
Simulate multiple players joining and leaving in rapid succession
Verify room player list updates correctly and no crashes occur
Verify game state synchronization remains consistent

title: Performance: UI Responsiveness and Animation Smoothness
description: Verify the UI is responsive, accessible, and animations (such as draw celebrations) render smoothly without lag on various device types.

steps.description: Open key screens (Home, Lobby, Game, Victory) on desktop and mobile devices
Verify UI elements respond promptly to user inputs
Observe celebration and transition animations and verify smooth frame rendering and no jank
